Jewellery Entrustment & Security Procedures

Handover Process & Signing Requirements

 

*	Before handover, a visual inspection must be conducted by a qualified expert from the De Beers team or an assigned third-party expert. Photographs should be taken, and the description, condition, and serial number of the piece must be documented.
*	Before receiving the jewellery, the recipient (whether an agency representative, stylist, influencer, or celebrity) must sign an agreement, which includes:

*	A Confirmation Form must be signed, verifying that the item has been returned in the same condition as received.
